com.maxeye.einksdk.YModem

类 YModemUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxeye.einksdk.YModem.YModemUtil

  • public class YModemUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Util for encapsulating data package of ymodem protocol

    Created by leonxtp on 2017/9/16. Modified by leonxtp on 2017/9/16

      • getYModelHello

        public static byte[] getYModelHello()
        Get the first package data for hello with a terminal

      • getFileNamePackage

        public static byte[] getFileNamePackage(java.lang.String fileNameString,
                                        int fileByteSize)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Get the file name package data
        参数:
        fileNameString - file name in String
        fileByteSize - file byte size of int value
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • getDataPackage

        public static byte[] getDataPackage(byte[] block,
                                    int dataLength,
                                    byte sequence)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Get a encapsulated package data block
        参数:
        block - byte data array
        dataLength - the actual content length in the block without 0 filled in it.
        sequence - the package serial number
        返回:
        a encapsulated package data block
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • bytesToHex

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes)

        Get the EOT package

                     throws java.io.IOException

      • getInputStream

        public static java.io.InputStream getInputStream(android.content.Context context,
                                                 java.lang.String fileAbsolutePath)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Get InputStream from Assets, you can customize it from the other sources
        参数:
        fileAbsolutePath - absolute path of the file in asstes
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
